title: A moment of Silence for Will of the Ancients
body: Whether you loved it or hated it, it's always sad to see an item go. Press f to pay respect.

replies.body: MY POOR VLAD D: PLEASE COME BACK TO ME D:
DW Vlad is getting a rework to with the missing spellvamp in mind. I'm actually pretty excited to play new Vlad,Brand and Malz

Yea i looked at the mage updates, they look pretty cool i must say! I'm glad Malz is getting some love, even if it'll be tough love for those of us playing against him. :S

I am sceptical of Vlad's update (just because i have used him for so long and so any change scares me) i don't know what to think of his new E, but i shall reserve judgment until i play him. But Judging from previous reworks however Sion/Poppy/Taric/Shen etc i have faith in you guys at riot :)
I hate it, malz is already broken enough, his r can kill anyone almost instantly and now he has a freaking shield which reduces the damage outcome from enemies. RIP ad assassins.

Tbh im not going to miss any part of AD assassins whatsoever.

But he does look very strong.

ok, so seeing the preview of Brand, his new passive will not be nice to squishies
Not
Nice
At
All
I would agree, except like usual when vs brand, the squishes will be dead looooooooong before his new passive kicks in.

I'm still mourning all these items. Just add it to the list and I'll get around to mourning it.

[Items removed from League of Legends](http://leagueoflegends.wikia.com/wiki/Removed_items)

I always felt the stats of wota never really justified a purchase. Higher ap items were available and the returns from spell vamp couldn't compete with life steal. Always wanted to but never took the plunge.
Yeah but with the item changes in place... Those Swain fans are going to come back out in force now that you can close gaps well etc.

I don't think they've ever removed an item from this game that I'll miss...

But still a moment of silence for this item they reasonably removed.
